channel.title: Yanael Barbier on Moonshot Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Yanael Barbier on Moonshot Engineer

item.title: Init
item.description: Everything starts with an init. It’s a perfect time to release my new project, Moonshot Engineer, a place where I can share my learnings and my views mostly about tech, startups, software and data. Root cause One thing I love the most is understanding how people works. Every project have inputs and outputs, sometimes the outputs are outstanding but what’s the processes and steps to produce these outputs? How the things are made behind the hood?
